Uses of Package
it.polimi.travlendarplus.exceptions.authenticationExceptions

  • Packages that use it.polimi.travlendarplus.exceptions.authenticationExceptions 
    Package Description
    it.polimi.travlendarplus.RESTful.authenticationManager  
    it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.emailManager  
    it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities  
    it.polimi.travlendarplus.exceptions.authenticationExceptions  
  • Classes in it.polimi.travlendarplus.exceptions.authenticationExceptions used by it.polimi.travlendarplus.RESTful.authenticationManager 
    Class and Description
    InvalidCredentialsException
    This exception is thrown during the authentication process, if the credential sent to the ApplicationServer are invalid.
    InvalidTokenException
    This exception is thrown during the token checking process when the user sends a request with a token and that token is invalid
    UserNotRegisteredException
    This exception is thrown during the authentication process, if the credential sent to the ApplicationServer are not associated to an user.
  • Classes in it.polimi.travlendarplus.exceptions.authenticationExceptions used by it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.emailManager 
    Class and Description
    MailPasswordForwardingFailedException
    This exception can be thrown if the email forwarding fails
  • Classes in it.polimi.travlendarplus.exceptions.authenticationExceptions used by it.polimi.travlendarplus.entities 
    Class and Description
    InvalidTokenException
    This exception is thrown during the token checking process when the user sends a request with a token and that token is invalid
  • Classes in it.polimi.travlendarplus.exceptions.authenticationExceptions used by it.polimi.travlendarplus.exceptions.authenticationExceptions 
    Class and Description
    AuthenticationException
    This is the main exception class used during the authentication process.
